name: PlayStation Underground: Jampack Summer 2001
synopsis: A collection of demos from the Official PlayStation Magazine. The disc contains demos of [[ATV Offroad Fury]], [[Cool Boarders 2001]], [[ICO]], [[Klonoa 2: Lunatea's Veil]], [[Soul Reaver 2]], [[MX 2002 Featuring Ricky Carmichael]], [[Red Faction]], [[Star Wars Starfighter]], [[Zone of the Enders]], videos of [[Drakan: The Ancients' Gates]], [[Gauntlet Dark Legacy]], [[Okage: Shadow King]] as well as Behind-the-Scenes movies on Cool Boarders 2001 and Star Wars: Starfighter.
